thread.title: Inside Istanbul's Reina nightclub after the attack
thread.title_full: Inside Istanbul's Reina nightclub after the attack

title: Inside Istanbul's Reina nightclub after the attack
text:
Turkey News Inside Istanbul's Reina nightclub after the attack Staff from the upscale nightclub attacked on New Year's Eve return to the venue for the first time. 04 Jan 2017 05:14 GMT Turkey , Middle East 
Employees have returned to the Reina nightclub for the first time since the New Year's attack that left 39 people dead. 
Inside the venue, there are bloodstains on the floor and drinks abandoned by guests still standing on the bar. 
Al Jazeera's Mohammed Jamjoom reports. Source: Al Jazeera News Tell us what you think Content on this website is for general information purposes only.
